name: The Frogrooms
description:
Welcome to the Frogrooms!   You wake up with no memory of anything or anyone. The only thing you can hear is a voice that tells you that you're in danger!

More than a simple backroom game :)

Set in an alternative reality, you take on the role of a frog. Without knowing what to do or where to go, you will have to find a way out. 

enjoy exploring, fighting, discover the truth about who and where you are and much more while trying to mantain your sanity and health high in a disturbing and misleading environment! The game also has a story!

Will you follow the voice that guides you, or go your way?

PROTAGONIST

It was made in only 72 hours for a jam, right now it might be pretty short and empty, but once the jam is over, I will post a more complete version.
